item.title: Building Brand Authenticity on Social Media: The Impact of Instagram Ad Model Genuineness and Trustworthiness on Perceived Brand Authenticity and Consumer Responses
item.description: Smiling faces and snapshot aesthetics on Instagram boost perceived source genuineness, enhancing brand authenticity, trust, and consumer intentions.
